nl.inl.blacklab.search.results

Class HitGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.results.Group<Hit>
      • nl.inl.blacklab.search.results.HitGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Group<Hit>>, Result<Group<Hit>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocResult

    public class HitGroup
extends Group<Hit>
    A group of results, with its group identity and the results themselves, that you can access randomly (i.e. you can obtain a list of Hit objects)

      • HitGroup

        protected HitGroup(QueryInfo queryInfo,
                   PropertyValue groupIdentity,
                   List<Hit> storedResults,
                   CapturedGroups capturedGroups,
                   int totalSize)
        Wraps a list of Hit objects with the HitGroup interface. NOTE: the list is not copied!
        Parameters:
        queryInfo - query info
        storedResults - the hits we actually stored
        capturedGroups - captured groups for hits in this group
        totalSize - total group size

      • HitGroup

        protected HitGroup(PropertyValue groupIdentity,
                   Hits storedResults,
                   int totalSize)
        Wraps a list of Hit objects with the HitGroup interface. NOTE: the list is not copied!
        Parameters:
        queryInfo - query info
        storedResults - the hits
